tidbits.title: Beautiful Coastline
tidbits.description: Mozambique boasts a stunning coastline along the Indian Ocean, offering pristine beaches, coral reefs, and excellent diving spots.

tidbits.title: Cultural Diversity
tidbits.description: The country's culture is diverse, influenced by indigenous traditions, Portuguese colonial heritage, and various ethnic groups.

tidbits.title: Natural Wonders
tidbits.description: Mozambique features natural wonders like the Gorongosa National Park and the Bazaruto Archipelago, rich in biodiversity and scenic beauty.
